message: I have a high-quality product available for $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to offer a 5-year warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're interested, I can also provide a free consultation to help you get the most out of this product.
I'm interested in the offer, but I'd like to wait for the next round to make a decision.

I understand you're waiting for the next round. In the meantime, I'll give you a bit more information about the product. Unfortunately, this one is not as good as the previous one. I'd say it's a 'nice-to-have' rather than a'must-have'. The quality is still decent, but it's not going to change your life. The price remains the same at $10000. If you're still interested, I can throw in a free accessory to make it a bit more appealing.
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait for the next round to make a decision.

I understand you're still hesitant. I want to assure you that this product is a game-changer. It's a top-of-the-line item that will exceed your expectations. If you're still unsure, I can also provide a detailed comparison with the previous product to help you see the value.
I'm willing to take a chance on this product. I'd like to buy it.

I'd say it's a'must-have' for anyone in your position. The price remains at $10000, but I'm willing to throw in a premium service package that includes dedicated support and priority updates. I'm impressed with the previous product, and the additional features you're offering sound appealing. I'd like to buy this product.

I appreciate the offer, and the discount is attractive. I'm willing to take advantage of the exclusive deal and buy the product.
